author: jgm
content: Looks like a good idea. I'd include a `v*-beta.*` as well, and perhaps an RC one?

author: nflaig
content: would need to define what each one means then and when to use it, or we can add those and leave it open to whom is cutting the pre-release to pick a tag

author: nflaig
content: I have added beta and rc, might be a good option to have

author: .paulharris
content: would be nice to have those RC's then just simply promote the RC to a release or something without the PRs in the current release process...
